## StateType.init() method

Initializes the public API for usage in plugin components

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
init(state: T, onChange: (initial: StateUpdater<T>, executor?: StateExecutor<StateUpdater<T>>) => void): R;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            | Description                                                                                     |
| --------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| state     | T                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               | current state                                                                                   |
| onChange  | (initial: [StateUpdater](./internal__plugin-state.stateupdater.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt;, executor?: [StateExecutor](./internal__plugin-state.stateexecutor.md)<!-- -->&lt;[StateUpdater](./internal__plugin-state.stateupdater.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt;&gt;) =&gt; void | callback to set the state, accepts a \[\[StateUpdater\]\] and an optional \[\[StateExecutor\]\] |

<b>Returns:</b>

R
